As the battle of Autobot vs Decepticon, Maximal vs Predicon continued 
to r=
age near the black Fortress - high over ahead, the same clouds 
that origin=
ally disgorged Megatron continued to roll and twist as 
dark winds thrust t=
hrough them, ripping at them like some unseen 
claws.

In eerie silence sma=
ll motes of inky blackness seemed to appear from 
out of the broiling cloud=
s. First only a few sprinkled amidst the 
skies like soot, but then all too=
 quickly they grew in both number 
and size!

Then two bright lights seemed=
 to streak from the group, like shooting 
stars bursting from amidst the cl=
ouds. As they passed through the 
group the motes of black are briefly lit,=
 revealing the distinctive 
oblong shape of Scourge's hunters, trackers and=
 killers! Many 
centuries from today humans will dare to call them soap-dis=
hes with 
cannons, but today they have arrived and are intent upon destruct=
ion!

As the twin lights pass out into the open skies they only become 
bri=
ghter and more powerful as their pod like shapes reveal their true 
charact=
er: MISSILES!! Like twin suns they streak forward, directing 
their destruc=
tive power down upon Hydras' base, even as the rest of 
the approaching hos=
t continues inexorably onward!

The Minions have arrived!!!!
